column2: The  petitioner-employer  filed  this  application  seeking  to  quash

column1: Commissioner  General  of  Labour  marked  P1  made  in  terms  of
section 6 of the Termination of Employment of Workmen (Special
Provisions)  Act,  No.45  of  1971,  as  amended,  whereby
petitioner was ordered to reinstate the  4th respondent employee
